text: Maison Louis Carré is a residential building in Bazoches-sur-Guyonne, France designed by Finnish modernist architects Elissa and Alvar Aalto. The house was designed for art collectors Olga and Louis Carré and completed in 1959. The building is the only remaining building by Aalto in France. Maison Louis Carré was opened to the public in 2007 under the management of the Alvar Aalto Association. == Gallery == File:Maison Louis Carre3.jpg File:Maison Louis Carre2.jpg File:LouisCarre3.JPG == References == Category:Alvar Aalto buildings Category:Buildings and structures in Yvelines Category:Houses completed in 1959
title: Maison Louis Carré
